item.title: [QUOTE]: Plastic Synapses Offer Hardware Alternative to Neural Networks
item.description: via Plastic synapses offer hardware alternative to neural networks | ArsTechnica A synapse—the connection between two neurons—consumes at most 100 femtoJoules per event. Once you realize that the entire human body is about the equivalent of an 120W light bulb, you can see that the efficiency of the brain is just astounding. […] This result has implications. If this research does turn out to be the way forward, neural networks will not operate faster than our own brains.
